title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.3 - Equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4104.3 - Equipment

State Regulations

During racing hours each licensed racing association
shall have such suitable extra equipment in the paddock as may be required for
the proper conduct of racing without unnecessary delay. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4104.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
